Room1.description: This is Room1, it leads to Room2 and Room3, and it has items in it...

Item1.description: This is an item, it can go in the inventory.

Item2.description: This is an item that cannot go in the inventory.

Room2.description: This is Room2, here the game ends, therefore the items + directions should not be interacted with...

Room3.description: Here is Room3, it leads to Room2
